backend/main.mo: Defines canister state and logic for user profiles, public profiles, events, chat messages, approvals, and access control using Maps and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking sponsor-section UI changes to affected frontend files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files including hooks, pages, and components used throughout the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all app pages and handles initial auth and profile-loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChatModera: Admin panel for listing, approving, and removing chat messages with UI actions and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventsMana: Admin interface for creating, updating, and deleting events with forms, dialogs, and event list actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileVal: Lists public profiles and allows admins to toggle validation status using mutations and UI badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublicProf: Lets admins select a user and edit their public profile fields, submitting updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Statistics: Displays admin statistics such as user, message, event, and point counts using fetched data.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity sign‑in and sign‑out with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Restricts access to admin‑only areas, showing an Access Denied card for non‑admins.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Redirects unauthenticated users to home and shows a sign‑in prompt when required.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOnbo: Redirects authenticated users who haven't completed onboarding to the onboarding flow.
Allows users to vote on messages and handles duplicate‑vote or failure errors with toasts.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sponsors: Shows a grid of sponsor cards linking to external websites.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, auth controls, and conditional admin links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides React Query hooks to check admin status and fetch platform statistics via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Exposes authentication state, principal, and login status derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Defines chat-related queries and mutations for fetching, posting, voting, approving, and removing messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the authenticated caller’s user profile with loading and fetch-state enhancements.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvents.ts: Implements event CRUD, RSVP actions, and event list/detail queries using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Fetches the leaderboard of principals and their point totals from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicProfiles.ts: Handles listing, fetching, updating, and validating public profiles through actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides user onboarding and profile-saving mutations that refresh the caller profile.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for statistics, profiles, events, and chat moderation.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays the community guestbook with message posting, live feed, and voting features behind auth.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDirectoryPag: Displays a directory of public community profiles with validation badges and links to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed event information and allows authenticated users to RSVP.
frontend/src/pages/EventsListPage.tsx: Lists upcoming community events with summaries and links to full event details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides the public landing page with features overview, login prompt, and automatic redirect for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a ranked leaderboard of users based on earned points with visual rank indicators.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view their points and update private profile information.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles user registration and onboarding completion, redirecting authenticated users based on profile status and displaying project intro content.
frontend/src/pages/PartnersPage.tsx: Displays a grid of partner organizations with logos, descriptions, and external links.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Fetches and displays a user's public profile with biography, services, and links, requiring auth and onboarding.
frontend/src/utils/linkParsing.ts: Provides helpers to validate URLs, extract them from text, and derive display labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, architecture notes, and requirements metadata.
